Name: Pingers
About the game: Gameplay The aim of Pingers is simple, move your paddles to hit the balls and keep them on the screen. You can pick up powerups to destroy as many balls as possible and get a higher score. Try to survive as long as you can! Play either COOP and work together to get the highest score, or VERSUS to compete to be the last standing. Controls We recommend using a gamepad but keyboard is also supported and works great. Simply use the analog sticks or WASD/Arrow keys to move your paddles and hit the balls! Add some more players to spice things up. Features Two game modes: COOP and VERSUS. Fast paced gameplay which gets harder over time Easy to learn controls with Keyboard or Gamepad 1-4 player local coop (or over remote play together!) Character customisation and unlocks! Steam leaderboards and achievements Great to play whilst waiting in a queue for another game Dev note I greatly appreciate feedback and will do my best to ensure support for this game. Please contact me through Discord, Twitter, Instagram, or the forums if you encounter any bugs, you have feature requests or you want to say hi! Thanks for taking the time to read this. I hope you enjoy playing Pingers! George Allen - Allen Games /
